item.title: 2025 Year in Review
item.description: Happy Christmas and happy new year! I know it's been a while since I last posted anything here, but thought I'd revive my tradition of writing another year in review post. Pluralsight Part of the reason for me not having as much time for blogging is that I created three new Pluralsight courses this year, bringing my total to 29. First up was a course about refactoring and optimizing code with GitHub Copilot.
